price: 8. Kuwaas, hoygoodu waa Naar, waxay kasbadeen awgeed (oo denbiyo ah).
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
